siteDescription: Kadir Lofca is a software engineer with a B.S. in Computer Science from the University of North Carolina at Greensboro. He has extensive experience in software engineering, developing interactive applications and tools. Kadir has worked on a range of projects, from game development to research in virtual reality, but his primary focus remains on engineering and application development. He currently serves as a STEM & Esports Mentor at Stiegler EdTech, where he applies his engineering expertise to create innovative solutions.
